docket_entries.description: Chapter 7 Voluntary Petition, Schedules and Statements (except for those listed below). The mailing list of creditors if not uploaded when the petition was filed, must be uploaded no later than seven days from the date of the filing of the petition. Failure to timely upload the list of creditors, may result in dismissal of the case without further notice. Electronic Filing Declaration due 12/28/2009, filed by TIM MACKEY of MACKEY LAW FIRM PC on behalf of DAVID E. UPDIKE, DEBORAH ANN UPDIKE (MACKEY, TIM) (Entered: 12/04/2009)
Meeting of Creditors scheduled for 01/07/2010 at 03:00 PM at US Trustee Meeting Room, 230 N. First Avenue, Suite 102, Phoenix, AZ (341-PHX). (MACKEY, TIM) (Entered: 12/04/2009)

Chapter 7 Indiv/Joint--Notice of Meeting of Creditors. 341(a) meeting to be held on 1/7/2010 at 03:00 PM at US Trustee Meeting Room, 230 N. First Avenue, Suite 102, Phoenix, AZ (341-PHX) Complaints under Sections 727 or 523 due by 3/8/2010. (Morgan, Kayla) (Entered: 12/07/2009)
